poster.username: Came to Fap, Stay for the Plot

body: The first page looks ok, but the rest not so much. Part 2 is good tho

legit? i could see learning spoken or romaji japanese, but the written version? no way. even just the hundreds of kana already sound impossible for a person already used to sub-30 letter alphabets, and don't even get me started on the thousands of kanji. it is just not humanly possible. the fact that some people actually claim to have learned them just reinforces my solipsism beliefs. you all are just not real. you can't possibly be with such absurd capabilities. you are just figments of my imagination whose only purpose is to translate my imaginary porn.
Legit if you want translations learn Japanese. Within a year or two you wont have any problems.
this fucking sucks. the 4 "skin" girls are sexy, cool & powerful. i like them. so why would i want to see them beaten, raped & abused?
May I ask for an English ver?
